Action.Lua: --Shutdown --建议设置额外辅助键激活以免误关机，比如，左右键同时按下在划手势才激活， --传统关机 --acRunProgram("c:\\windows\\system32\\shutdown.exe","-s -t 0",0,1) --win8混合关机 acRunProgram("c:\\windows\\system32\\shutdown.exe","-s -hybrid -t 0",0,0)

--Auto Scroll --by defpt --鼠标移动到桌面左侧(大概一个Win8任务栏宽度)即可退出自动滚屏 function Timing()--计时器,为了快速跳出自动滚屏采用了分步计时 for i=0,60,1 do --请自行计算选择i的最大值(0和1中间那个值) if acGetMouseLocationX()<=60 then break else acDelay(500) end --计时精度500ms end end while acGetMouseLocationX()>60 do Timing() if acGetMouseLocationX()<=60 then break else acSendKeys("{PGDN}") end end --滚屏速度=计时精度*i的最大值 --默认设置计时精度理论值500ms，实际耗时应该会>500ms，PC的cpu不同，这个实际值也不同，不过应该差不太多 --所以如果设置30秒一屏的话，i最大值=(30*1000ms)/500ms=60

--Scroll With Mouse --by defpt --划手势激活，光标移到滚动条滑块即可拖动鼠标进行自由滚动，鼠标移到桌面底部退出激活状态 function acScroll()--滚动状态 if acGetExecutableName(nil, gsx, gsy) == "iexplore.exe" then --IE总是独立特行 while acGetPixelRByPoint(x,y)..acGetPixelBByPoint(x,y)..acGetPixelGByPoint(x,y) ~= "205205205" do x=acGetMouseLocationX() y=acGetMouseLocationY() end else while acGetPixelRByPoint(x,y)..acGetPixelBByPoint(x,y)..acGetPixelGByPoint(x,y) ~= "166166166" do x=acGetMouseLocationX() y=acGetMouseLocationY() end end acMouseClick(acGetMouseLocationX(),acGetMouseLocationY(),2,1,0) while acGetMouseLocationY()<796 do d=acGetWindowRight(nil,gsx,gsy) - acGetMouseLocationX() if d > 22 then break else acDelay(300) end end acMouseClick(acGetMouseLocationX(),acGetMouseLocationY(),2,0,1) waiting() end
function waiting()--非滚动等待状态 while acGetMouseLocationY()<796 do d=acGetWindowRight(nil,gsx,gsy) - acGetMouseLocationX() if d<=22 then break else acDelay(300) end end main() end
function main() if acGetMouseLocationY()<796 then acScroll() end end main()
--d是距离，鼠标距离窗口右侧的宽度 --796是我显示器（1280x800）底部，请自行设置该值 --300此值设置检测当前鼠标位置的频率
--Send to Notepad acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^c") acShellExecute("open","Notepad2.exe","","D:\\Program Files\\Notepad2\\","") acDelay(300) acSendKeys("^v")

--Translate With Google --by defpt acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^c") acDelay(50) local text=acGetClipboardText() if text == "" then text = acInputBox("Google 翻译","请输入待翻译文本","") end acDelay(50) local URL="http://translate.google.de/#auto/zh-CN/"..text acShellExecute("",URL,"","","")

--Search With Google --by defpt acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^c") acDelay(50) local text=acGetClipboardText() if text=="" then text=acInputBox("Google 搜索", "请输入待搜索内容", "") end acDelay(50) local URL="https://www.google.de/search?q="..text acShellExecute("",URL,"","","")

--Clip to OneNote --by defpt acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^c") local data=acGetClipboardText() if data ~= "" then acShellExecute("open","Onenote.exe","/sidenote","C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\Office15\\","") acDelay(3000) --看自己机子设置延时大小 acSendKeys("^v") else acSendKeys("^a") acDelay(50) acSendKeys("^c") acDelay(50) acShellExecute("open","Onenote.exe","/sidenote","C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\Office15\\","") acDelay(3000) --看自己机子设置延时大小 acSendKeys("^v") end
--SupperBack local x = acGetWindowTitle(nil, gsx, gsy) acSendKeys("{BROWSERBACK}") local y=acGetWindowTitle(nil, gsx, gsy) if x==y then acSendKeys("{LEFT}") --模拟键盘左方向键 end
--SupperForward local x = acGetWindowTitle(nil, gsx, gsy) acSendKeys("{BROWSERFORWARD}") local y=acGetWindowTitle(nil, gsx, gsy) if x==y then acSendKeys("{RIGHT}") --模拟键盘右方向键 end

--Search in website --by defpt acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^c") acDelay(50) local text=acGetClipboardText() if text=="" then text=acInputBox("Google 站内搜索", "请输入待搜索内容", "") end acSendKeys("%d") acSendKeys("^c") acDelay(50) local domain=string.gsub(acGetClipboardText(),"https?://(.-)%/.*","%1") acDelay(50) local url="https://www.google.de/search?q=site:"..domain.." "..text acDelay(50) acShellExecute("",url,"","","")

--Open in WebeCache acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("%d") acSendKeys("^c") local url=acGetClipboardText() acSetClipboardText("http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:"..url) acSendKeys("^v") acSendKeys("~")
--Open With Firefox acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^l") acSendKeys("^c") local url=acGetClipboardText() acShellExecute("open","firefox.exe",url,"D:\\Program Files\\Mozilla Firefox\\","")

--Open Link or Search Text(forground) acConsumePhysicalInput(1) acMouseMove(gsx,gsy) acDelay(20) if acGetMouseCursorType() == "HAND" then acSendControlDown() acDelay(25) acSendShiftDown() acMouseClick(gsx, gsy, 2, 1, 1) acDelay(25) acSendShiftUp() acSendControlUp() else acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^c") acDelay(25) acSendKeys("^k") acDelay(25) acSendKeys("^v") acSendKeys("%{ENTER}") end acConsumePhysicalInput(0)

--Open Link or New Tab(background) acConsumePhysicalInput(1) acMouseMove(gsx,gsy) acDelay(20) if acGetMouseCursorType() == "HAND" then acMouseClick(gsx, gsy, 1, 1, 1) else acSendKeys("^t") end acConsumePhysicalInput(0)
--Open With IE acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^l") acSendKeys("^c") local url=acGetClipboardText() acShellExecute("open","iexplore.exe",url,"C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\","")
--Open With Chrome acSetClipboardText("") acSendKeys("^l") acSendKeys("^c") local url=acGetClipboardText() acShellExecute("open","MyChrome.exe",url,"D:\\Program Files\\MyChrome\\","")
